attributes.action: Force The Resignation of The Child Protection Workers Who Failed Baby P in Haringey and Ultimately Caused The Death of An Innocent Child.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The failings of said 'professionals' resulted in the imminent death of an innocent child. This in my, and many others minds is gross negligence and should result in more than a written warning.

Please sign and show your support for change in the system and justice for Baby P and others like him.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
